lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba was absent again when the Montreal Impact played the New England Revolution on Sunday, falling further out of the team’s picture.

headline.print_headline: Drogba Absent Again as Impact Limp Into Playoffs
headline.main: Drogba Absent Again as Impact Limp Into Playoffs
